## Q1

Take the derivative of sum( w * (x - mu) ^ 2 ):
\begin{align}
10 * \mu - 2*w*x &= 0 \nonumber \\
\mu &= 1.77
\end{align}

## Q2

```{r}
raw_dat = read.table('shhs1.txt',header = 1)
raw_dat$log = log(raw_dat$rdi4p + 1)
fit = lm(log ~ waist + age_s1 + gender + bmi_s1, data = raw_dat)
summary(fit)
```
